title: Pear and rosemary 'tarte tatin' with vanilla ice cream
description: Shake up the classic tarte tatin with pears and rosemary flavoured caramel. Any type of pear will work, but small, smooth textured varieties such as Concorde or Doyenne du Comice will be especially nice.Equipment and preparation: For this recipe you will need an ovenproof frying pan.
ingredients: 250g/9oz cold butter, cut into small cubes
4 pears, peeled, cores removed, cut in half
2 vanilla pod, split and seeds removed
